abstract: South Africans unify through love of braai, Afrikaan term for grilling, popular cooking tradition that has inspired national holiday; recipes for braai-spiced T-bone steaks and grilled corn with chile butter shared.

headline.main: South Africa, One Nation United by the Grill

snippet: They call it braai, an outdoor cooking ritual with many rules but no limits.
lead_paragraph: They call it braai, an outdoor cooking ritual with many rules but no limits.
